promotionMessage:
To participate in the contest:
1. Follow @prakarsh2019 on Instagram
2. Post images with hashtag: #Prakarsh2019
3. Instagram profile should be publicly visible during Feb 19-21.

Top 8 Instagrammers will be awarded on 15th February 2019 based on the total no. of likes they receive on posts with #Prakarsh2019.
